applets.title: Applet 1 - Basic Events
applets.description: This is the applet 1, this will take you to a website that allows you to input a text and it automatically shows the text and it also has a display button that when you click it will display what you just typed.

applets.title: Applet 2 - Leaflet Map
applets.description: This is the applet 2, this will take you to a website or an applet that renders a Leaflet and Openstreetmap interactive map.

applets.title: Applet 3 - Event Button Logger
applets.description: This is the applet 3, this will take you to a website or applet that consists of a button and two display elements that show the logs and date, and the total number of logs.

applets.title: Applet 4 - Dynamic Elements
applets.description: This application applies dynamic elements such as rendering DOM elements from a list.
